duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct in-depth research on legislative landscapes at federal, state, and local levels to identify policies impacting the industry and provide actionable insights.
Represent the company in engaging with public officials and stakeholders, providing expert insights and addressing government-related issues, including direct lobbying efforts.
Build and foster relationships with elected officials, government staff, and community stakeholders to drive collaboration and positive policy outcomes.
Collaborate with Corporate Communications to craft internal and external outreach materials that educate and inform on public policy matters.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Business, Communications, Political Science, Public Administration or related field and at least 2 years of experience in public policy, government relations or combination of education and experience (Master’s preferred for Senior level)
